intro: Tacsonia mixta var. speciosa, commonly known as the showy tacsonia, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Meliaceae, which includes mahogany and related hardwood trees. The plant is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color.
